turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Think I Need It Too.
turn.1: What is Think I Need It Too?
turn.2: Think I Need It Too "Think I Need It Too" is a song by the British rock band Echo & the Bunnymen.
turn.4: The song was released as a single on 28 September 2009 on Ocean Rain Records.
turn.6: It is the first single from the band's eleventh studio album, "The Fountain" (2009).
turn.8: The song developed from sessions lead singer Ian McCulloch had with three London-based musicians.
turn.10: McCulloch said, "I thought [guitarist Will Sergeant and I] needed to do stuff differently, but so the result still sounded like the Bunnymen.
turn.12: " McCulloch felt that the sound was right and he and Sergeant returned to the studio to record material for "Fountain", including "Think I Need It Too".
